thread.section_title: Euro Car Parts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Euro Car Parts | www.eurocarparts.com | 5 of 75
thread.title: Bradley
thread.title_full: Euro Car Parts reviewed by Bradley

author: Bradley
title: Bradley
text:
"Awful computer says no" staff who know nothing about cars nor part companies, their parts catalogue is often wrong (changeovers etc). It's ridiculous! I just made a 150 mile trip for no reason whatsoever as they decided by VIN an expansion tank for a mk1 Peugeot is the same as a mk2. It's BASIC part selling!
Part quality is so poor that many times they are not even able to be fitted. I've tried to like this company so many times but have been let down on each occasion and seen so many other customers receive parts which I know are not correct!
What I can't understand is why the general public are so gormless because they keep using them.
There are so many better car parts companies out there if you just GOOGLE them.
